body:
All submissions for this problem are available.

According to Gregorian Calendar, it was Monday on the date 01/01/2001. If any year is input,
Write a program to display what is the day on the 1st January of this year.

Input

The first line contains an integer T, total number of testcases. Then follow T lines, each line contains an integer year.

Output

Display the day on the 1st January of that year in lowercase letter.

Constraints

  • 1 ≤ T ≤ 1000
  • 1900≤ A,B,C ≤2500

Example

Input

3 
1994
1991
2014

Output

saturday
tuesday
wednesday
languages_supported: ADA, ASM, BASH, BF, C, C99 strict, CAML, CLOJ, CLPS, CPP 4.3.2, CPP 4.9.2, CPP14, CS2, D, ERL, FORT, FS, GO, HASK, ICK, ICON, JAVA, JS, LISP clisp, LISP sbcl, LUA, NEM, NICE, NODEJS, PAS fpc, PAS gpc, PERL, PERL6, PHP, PIKE, PRLG, PYPY, PYTH, PYTH 3.4, RUBY, SCALA, SCM chicken, SCM guile, SCM qobi, ST, TCL, TEXT, WSPC
